original_title: Tyson Fury vs. Deontay Wilder III
overview: Tyson Fury vs. Deontay Wilder III, billed as Once and For All, is a professional boxing trilogy fight between the WBC and Ring heavyweight champion, Tyson Fury, and former WBC heavyweight champion, Deontay Wilder. The bout took place October 9th, 2021, at the T-Mobile Arena in Paradise, Nevada.
title: Tyson Fury vs. Deontay Wilder III
